text: Ezɨ ia dughiar kurabar aven itima Godɨn ian akurazir kam, ia datɨrɨghɨn akɨrim ragha a gasara. Egha ia kamaghɨn a mɨgei, ia kamaghsua, an atrivitam ia danɨngam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia datɨrɨghɨn izɨ uan anababa ko ikɨzibar Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn tuifigh, eghtɨ a ia bagh atrivitam amɨsɨvam.”
